title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 120.5 - S corporation shareholders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 120.5 - S corporation shareholders

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 620(d)

For a shareholder of an S corporation, the term
income tax
in section
120.1
(a) of this Part does not include any tax imposed upon or paid by the corporation, but does include any such tax imposed upon or payable by the shareholder to
another jurisdiction calculated on the income of the corporation, regardless of
whether the corporation is an S corporation in the other state by virtue of a
separate state election or in conformity with the Federal
election. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
120.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
